full_text: On the occasion of my wife becoming a citizen, I finally persuaded her to watch the Short Circuit 2 blu-ray that’s been collecting dust for over a decade, only to find the blu-ray player no longer works.
I got to see Gilbert Gottfried perform in one of Dana Gould’s Plan 9 From Outer Space readings AND I got to see him carefully walking down some stairs at the 23rd street station. RIP.
Today my wife becomes a citizen. https://t.co/3WBcCMXuAe
